ygData.msgSnippet: (Sigh, battle, it just shouldn t last so long.) ... Base takes damage, but what else could be done? The shields were still strong. ... left ... Base s shields

(Sigh, battle, it just shouldn't last so long.)

> The Oblitercons/Minion/Sixshot/Unitron/Demon Wulf/Dark Claw/Flesh
> Ripper/Serpentor/Shockwave:
>
>
> Dark One fired off another two missiles at the Mafia Base.

Base takes damage, but what else could be done? The shields were still
strong.

> Scavenger fired off 25 explosive shells at the Mafia Base, raising his
left
> arm, firing off a rocket at the base from his missile launcher.

Base's shields flicker.

> Demon Wulf fired off a blade missile at the Mafia Base.

Blade missile do damage like regular missile.

> Dark Claw formed another large orb, throwing the orb at the Mafia Base.

(Orb?) Orb meets base, base takes damage from orb.

> Unitron barrel rolled, taking shot hits to his wings.  He fired off two
more
> missiles at the Mafia Base.

(Yikes) Missiles make base shake, shields still okay.
